sentence.Network_en: The Ukrainians speak a Slavonic language similar to Russian.
sentence.Network_cn: 乌克兰人所说的那种斯拉夫语系的语言类似于俄语。

sentence.Network_en: Also from the Slavonic family of languages comes " robot " , a Czech word in origin.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自斯拉夫语族的语言中的还有robot(机器人), 它原是个捷克词语.

sentence.Network_en: In fact, its name in Old Slavonic actually means " main square " or " beautiful square. "
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上, 在斯拉夫语中,红场这名字的含义是 “ 大广场 ” 和 “ 美丽的广场 ”.

list.abs: 《斯拉夫舞曲》(Slavonic dance)是德沃夏克(Dvorak)的代表作之一。德沃夏克是十九世纪末晚期浪漫主义时期的重要作曲家，他一生 …

entry.tran: 斯拉夫语系的(包括俄语、捷克语、塞尔维亚-克罗地亚语等)
entry.def: Something that is Slavonic relates to East European languages such as Russian, Czech, and Serbo-Croat, or to the people who speak them.

example.ex: The Ukrainians speak a Slavonic language similar to Russian.
example.tran: 乌克兰人所说的那种斯拉夫语系的语言类似于俄语。

means.word_mean: 1. a branch of the Indo European family of language
1. of or relating to Slavic languages

auth_sentence.content: He forged or coined words that have Slavonic roots but are not really Russian.
auth_sentence.res_content: He forged or coined words that have Slavonic roots but are not really Russian.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He forged or coined words that have Slavonic roots but are not really Russian.

auth_sentence.content: I don't try to reach for incomprehensible words or Old Slavonic, and I don't make up any words.
